content: FYI I ]posted in Social](https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179160-social/topic/Cheat.20Sheet.20walk-through.3F/near/181016557) about wanting a walk-through of Firely's FHIR cheat-sheet, as a way of intriguing appropriate people (in the patient innovator world) about things they might do with FHIR.
